# bookclubdata

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Functions to fetch, parse, and save R4DS book club data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of bookclubdata from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("r4ds/bookclubdata")
```
